org.eclipse.scada.configuration.component

Interface SingleValue

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Component, DataComponent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ConstantValue, ExternalValue, PersistentValue
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConstantValueImpl, ExternalValueImpl, PersistentValueImpl, SingleValueImpl

    public interface SingleValue
extends DataComponent
    A representation of the model object 'Single Value'.

    The following features are supported:

    • Name
    • Data Type
    • Customization Tags

    See Also:
    ComponentPackage.getSingleValue()

         getCustomizationTags()
